info.name: Manual Paint
info.detail: Like Automatic print mode, but allows for more control over what elements are painted and how, with a number of other options.

status.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the current job? The preview canvas will be kept

commands.resettitle: Delete preview lines and reset canvas.

auto.painttitle: Paint the entire drawing automatically. Verifies colors by running auto color first.

buffer.playtitle: Shunts recorded commands into current buffer

commands.stroketitle: Stroke the selected path with an outline.
commands.filltitle: Fill the selected path with a given fill style.
commands.checktitle: If unchecked, tracing will rely on path shape only, ignoring path overlap.
commands.calibratetitle: Position the brush center at the top left corner for calibration.
